title: New Champ Select in Normals
body:
Hi guys,

It's been almost the entire year now since new champ select came to ranked.. any idea when we might get "new" champ select in normal games?

It'd be nice not to have the arguments associated with calling roles and the troll picks when someone doesn't get theirs. Also allows us to go in and actually practice a champ/role knowing what we'll get before we start.

I don't mind waiting, I'd rather sit in queue longer and get the role I want rather than have a shorter queue and have to contend with calling and the arguments that follow.

replies.body: If blind picks got removed the game wouldn't be fun anymore, it's chill and you can play a game so easily, if this happened for me and a lot of people it wouldn't be as chilled and laid back :(
I'm not too fussed about if they are blind or not, I just think the idea of having to call a lane and deal with the issues that comes from that are a turn off.

They have the new champ select in Draft Pick Normals on other servers.

I don't think it would come to blind pick until next season though. Its not a priority for Riot since most other servers have Draft Pick Normals which already have the new champ select.

And before you ask, no; Riot already said multiple times this year that OCE is "too small" for Draft Normals.
